name: In A House
description:
A game that came from Ludum Dare 47.

## Post - Jam Game

  • New Level Design, UI, mechanics and more.
  • Find the fragments while manage your HP and Battery Levels.
  • Craft Keys, destroy them and craft other ones.
  • Don't forget that, when you destroy a key, you will receive half of the amount of fragments used to craft the same one.
  • You will not find any Green Fragments in the house, so make sure to destroy some keys in order to craft the Green Key.
  • Try to improve your time playing again. The higher score is "S" and, the lower one, "F". That if you don't die from dehydration.
  • Don't forget to enjoy :)
